name: Running one factory should return a basic POJO filled with basic types

testSteps.description: Given I have a Podam Factory for simple types
When I invoke Podam on a POJO with only basic types

children.description: Invoke podam on pojo with only basic types

testSteps.description: Then The returned simple POJO should not be null

children.description: Validate returned pojo is not null

testSteps.description: And The returned simple POJO should have its basic types filled with data

children.description: Then the returned pojo should have its basic fields validated with data

title: Running one factory should return a basic POJO filled with basic types

tags.name:
Podam should fill in types contained in the JVM
As a user
I want Podam Factory to fill in object graphs for all native types
So that I can count on the framework to fill in basic POJOs
Basic types/Podam should fill in types contained in the jvm
